statements: DELETE FROM Water_Usage_Data WHERE building_id = 3 AND usage_date > '2022-01-01'

DELETE FROM Water_Usage_Data WHERE usage_date < '2021-07-01' AND daily_usage > 100

DELETE FROM Building WHERE name = 'Main Office';
DELETE FROM WaterUsageData WHERE building_id = 123 AND consumption > 1000;
DELETE FROM WaterUsageData WHERE date_recorded >= '2022-01-01' AND water_consumption < 1000;
